label.en: Restore state of O2 after power failure
label.nl: Herstel status van O2 na stroom uitval

label.en: Output 2 saves last on/off status and restores it after a power failure
label.nl: Output 2 hersteld on/off status na stroom uitval

label.en: Output 2 does not save on/off status and does not restore it after a power failure, it remains off
label.nl: Output 2 is standaard uit na stroom uitval
